item.title: Karnataka's Raichur thermal plant conducts mock drill to check readiness
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: As part of the civil defence mock drill amid the escalating tensions between India and Pakistan, the Raichur District Disaster Management Authority and the district administration, along with various departments, organised ‘Operation Abhyaas’ on the helipad premises of Raichur Thermal Power Station (RTPS) in Shaktinagar on Friday.

item.title: Mock Drills in Raichur, Mysuru, Mandya and Karwar Begin May 9 Amid Heightened Security
item.description:

Bengaluru: The civil defence mock drills in Raichur, Mysuru, Mandya and Karwar in Karnataka will be held from Friday, May 9, senior officers said.
